sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
appears
, se premakne tja, kjer se vidi.

seg.quote: A glow of light appeared over the sea.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj novega
appears
, začne obstajati ali postane dostopno.

seg.quote: His second novel appeared under the title ‘Getting By’.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
appears in a play or show
, sodeluje v drami ali predstavi.

To appear before a court of law
pomeni iti na sodišče, da bi odgovarjali za obtožbe ali dali podatke.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
TO-INF
or
COMPLEMENT,
or
REPORT VB

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
appears to be
takšno, kot opisujemo, da je, hočemo povedati, da mi tako mislimo.

seg.quote: Their offer appears to be the most attractive.
